about_the_game:
Long after Ragnarök, the war that killed the old gods, the land is ruled by an evil dragon. Legend speaks of a phoenix that is supposed to rise, challenge, and defeat the dragon, thus establishing a new era of peace. Yet fulfillment of the prophecy is long overdue, and evil corrupts the land.

The village of Wildeburn has long been under threat from the dragon and his minions. Many heroes left, intending to vanquish him. None have returned.

A young woman named Dorian must find a way to defeat him, or she and her village will be lost to the annals of time. But what can she do that countless heroes before her could not? What happened to them? Was the prophecy false? Where is the long-anticipated phoenix? Can anything stop the dragon?

Will you become yet another victim of the evil dragon, or will you emerge victorious from…

Out of the Ashes

Gameplay

Out of the Ashes is a third person, semi-open world, story-driven adventure game set in the Viking era. Play as Dorian as she wields a sword, learns magic, and discovers the one weapon that can stop the dragon.

Explore landscapes, descend into dungeons and caves, and fight enemies. Discover hidden treasures, dark secrets, and powerful runes.

Studio

Brought to you by Tokisan Games, a small team distributed all over the world.

content_descriptors.notes: Killing of monsters, freeing of captured humans.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4670k or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 (6GB) or AMD RX 5500 XT (8GB) or Intel Arc A750
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: Out of the Ashes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4670k or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 (6GB) or AMD RX 5500 XT (8GB) or Intel Arc A750
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The old gods are dead. Dorian must find a way to defeat the dragon who rules the land. Can she discover the ultimate weapon and bring about a new age of peace before her village is destroyed?
